{"name": "Hickory Grove Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Closed before, during, and after major holidays
* There is no appointment for drive thru. But you need an appointment if you are walking in.
*  They only take 25 clients as walk ins. 
*  Call 704-531-4000 to confirm if the pantry is open that week ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.hickorygrove.org/hickory-grove/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7200 East W.T. Harris Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Charlotte", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28215", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.22109260000001, "longitude": -80.7253968}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 566-7508", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed before, during, and after holidays."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
